articles.title: Rhode Island to enter statewide pause on Monday - WJAR
articles.description: Rhode Island will enter a state-wide pause on Monday in an attempt to stop rising coronavirus cases from overwhelming the health care system. The two-week pause will force some businesses to close starting on Monday, while others will face additional restrict…
